objects.text:
• Durable Synthetic Leather
• Spacious Design with Compartment
• Gold-tone Hardware & Charm Detail
• Perfect Medium Size for Daily Use

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and elegant layout ideal for showcasing a luxury fashion product. A structured grid background is segmented into four quadrants filled with warm, neutral tones and overlaid by faint geometric lines and semi-transparent circles that add depth. The product image (“product_image”) is prominently centered on the upper-right side, drawing attention.

On the left, the title area includes a bold brand name (“heading”) and a subtitle (“subheading”), both in sophisticated sans-serif fonts. Below that, a multi-line product description (“description”) details features in bullet form. At the bottom right, a large price tag (“price”) sits above a call-to-action button (“cta”) with a contrasting background (“cta_background”).

**Color Palette:**
- Cream (#F5F0E8)
- Light Beige (#E8D9C5)
- Taupe Brown (#B38867)
- Soft Gold (#D4B795)
- Accent Mustard (#D4A76A)
- Deep Brown (#5D4037)
- Rich Coffee (#8B5A2B)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated handbag in a muted, warm tan color (#C19578), creating a neutral yet elegant base. Accents of polished gold (#D4AF37) in the hardware and keychain charms add a luxurious contrast, subtly highlighting the overall earthy tone. The texture of the synthetic leather provides depth, allowing light to reflect and enhance both the tan and gold hues. The blend of matte and metallic creates a chic visual balance. For a banner, use a palette of Tan (#C19578), Gold (#D4AF37), Soft Cream (#F5EBDD), and Charcoal Brown (#5A4A42) to maintain elegance while drawing attention.
